pages.text: $(li)The Phantoplasm is an item that can only be dropped by the $(l:patchouli:bosses/bellringer)Bellringer$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be used to craft the $(l:patchouli:tools/meet_your_fight/spectre_eye)Spectre's Eye$(/l), an $(l)Aether-Glazed Cupcake$(), the $(l:patchouli:tools/meet_your_fight/passage_toll)Passage's Toll$(/l), a Music Disc and the $(l:patchouli:tools/meet_your_fight/spectre_grasp)Spectre's Grasp$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l)$(/l).
